title: SpaceJunkies: a comic platform for astronomy engagement
abstractText: To increase awareness of world-class UK (STFC) astronomy and space research amongst young people aged 11 - 14.
impactText: The comics were produced and uploaded to the Planet Science Website. While the project was ongoing, teachers were in touch and using the comics. Education Cultural,Societal
organisation: University of the West of England
findingsText: I have developed a set of comics about astronomy. through the process, we have understood more about what motivates and engages children and their teachers to use comics. It is clear that teachers and young people believe that narrative approaches can be helpful to children when it comes to learning about science and technology because it places abstract knowledge into a familiar context.
